name: warpgate
description: Warpgate is a self-hosted secure access gateway for SSH, RDP, and databases. It provides auditing, session recording, and role-based access via web UI and configuration files.
features: Protocol support: Provide secure access to SSH, RDP, MySQL, and PostgreSQL connections through a single gateway.
Session recording: Automatically record all sessions for compliance, auditing, and security review purposes.
Role-based access: Define granular permissions controlling which users can access specific servers and services.
Web-based SSH: Access SSH sessions directly from a browser without requiring terminal software on client devices.
Multi-factor authentication: Enhance security with MFA support including TOTP, WebAuthn, and SSO integration.
Connection logging: Track all connection attempts, successful logins, and commands executed for audit trails.
User management: Create and manage users, groups, and access policies through an intuitive web interface.
Session playback: Review recorded sessions with playback controls to investigate incidents or training purposes.
IP whitelisting: Restrict access based on source IP addresses or network ranges for additional security layers.
Certificate management: Handle SSH keys and certificates centrally to simplify credential rotation and revocation.
Activity monitoring: View real-time active sessions and connection statistics through the admin dashboard.
Webhook integration: Send notifications to external systems when specific events occur like failed login attempts.
